key_talking_points: We are underway in Edmonton, with Florida holding a one-goal lead early in the first.
The Panthers are trying to extend their lead, with Sam Reinhart ringing a shot off the crossbar early in the period.
The Oilers are responding with physical play, looking to establish a tone early. Leon Draisaitl with a hit on Gustav Forsling, followed by Evander Kane on Aaron Ekblad.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is starting, but there is a lot of physical play. A missed shot off the crossbar indicates offensive pressure. The score is close, so maintaining awareness of the game state is important. MIXED_COVERAGE will allow for both play-by-play and some higher-level analysis.

high_intensity_events.summary: A. Barkov (away) wins faceoff against L. Draisaitl (home) at center ice
S. Reinhart (away) missed shot, hit crossbar against S. Skinner (home)

task_details.specific_guidance: Balance play-by-play with analysis of the Oilers' physical response and the Panthers' offensive pressure. Mention the close score and the importance of the next goal.
